entry.def: A thinker is a person who spends a lot of time thinking deeply about important things, especially someone who is famous for thinking of new or interesting ideas.

example.tran: 世界上一些最伟大的思想家

means.word_mean: 2. someone who exercises the mind (usually in an effort to reach a decision)
